item.title: Are Prataap Snacks Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: Prataap Snacks Ltd's latest Q2 FY26 results show a net profit increase to ₹4.14 crores, but a 54.92% decline in half-yearly profits raises concerns about sustainability. The significant drop in promoter holding and weak returns on equity and capital employed indicate ongoing challenges despite some short-term recovery signs. Time: Jan 17 2026 07:11 PM IST

item.title: Are Nitin Castings Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: Nitin Castings Ltd's latest Q2 FY26 results are concerning, showing a 74.08% decline in net profit to ₹1.48 crore despite a slight revenue increase, indicating significant operational challenges and margin compression. The company's profitability metrics suggest potential ongoing difficulties that need close monitoring. Time: Jan 17 2026 07:11 PM IST
